thread.title: Hotel with good location
thread.title_full: Hotel with good location - Review of Mercure Paris Opera Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PeterO7444
title: Hotel with good location
text:
The location of the hotel is very convenient for those who like shopping and also going to louvre museum. As all of these place could be arrive by walking.
Food is also easily found outside the hotel.
The only inconvenience is the lift as it very small but you can't complain because you are staying in a few hundred years old buildings. Some room is small but cosy.
Photo taken is outside my room.
